QuestData.Title: Victory for the Alliance
QuestData.Description: You have accomplished the impossible. The brood mother of the Black Dragonflight lies dead at your feet. Take her head and present it to the Grand Admiral in honor of the King.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Head of Onyxia to Grand Admiral Jes-Tereth in Stormwind.
QuestData.RewardText: For so many years I was held under her captivating gaze. Finally, to see justice meted and the honor of Stormwind restored! Today, we celebrate this glorious victory!
